channel.title: Need some more help - pickup flax and making it into bowstrings!
channel.description:
Hello, I'm having trouble understanding how to pick flax and make it into a bowstring... I'm only at stage 1 (pickup flax) I've added the code and it looks like this:
[code]case 2646: //flax addItem(1779, 1); sendMessage("You pick some flax"); break;[/code]
But when I log in, it does nothing... Please tell me how to add this case. I know esily how to make it into a bowstring but this is the only thing im confused about!
Thank you, -Zaron[br][size=1]Posted on: September 03, 2007, 04:29:45 PM[/size][hr]-
